vision_analysis.question_text: How would you describe your financial position? Please select one only
clickable_elements: Very comfortable - money isn't an issue and we can afford the nicer things in life
Comfortable - money isn't an issue, but we do try and save money when we can
Uncomfortable - money is an issue, but we get by day today
Very uncomfortable - money is an issue and we struggle to get by day to day

automation.response_value: Comfortable - money isn't an issue, but we do try and save money when we can
